original_text: Yea, ye yourselves know, that these hands have ministered unto my necessities, and to them that were with me.
korean_text: 여러분이 아는 바와 같이 이 손으로 나와 내 동행들이 쓰는 것을 충당하여

sentences.original_text: that these hands have ministered unto my necessities
sentences.korean_translation: 이 손들이 내 필요를 위해 봉사했다는 것을

sentences.original_text: and to them that were with me
